short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Top Search Tasks New Tab is your best assistant tool in organizing your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Top Search Tasks Default Search is a smart search extension that provides a unique search experience powered by Bing.

Top Search Tasks Default Search provides excellent search experience via configuring your Default Search to Top Search Tasks Search.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Top Search Tasks" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Top Search Tasks Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Top Search Tasks Search will provide exceptional custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at
Read About us: https://topsearchtasks.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://topsearchtasks.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://topsearchtasks.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://topsearchtasks.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

If at some point after installation you realize that you don't need Search Tasks Default Search, then there are 2 quick ways to deal with it!

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click ‘Remove’

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on ‘Extensions’
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the ‘Remove’ button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
